targets.query: SELECT last("temperature_C")  * 1.8+32 FROM "${tempSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("temperature_C") * 1.8+32 FROM "autogen"./^$tempSensor$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT min("temperature_C") * 1.8 +32 FROM "autogen"./^$tempSensor$/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("humidity") FROM "${tempSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: Fixed dewpoint panel, I broke it pretty bad somehow

targets.query: SELECT last("dewpoint") * 1.8000 + 32.00 FROM "Dewpoint" WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: Dewpoint II

targets.query: SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("rain_mm")))*0.03937 FROM "${rainSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("wind_avg_km_h") * 0.6213712 FROM "${windSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mode("wind_dir_deg") FROM "autogen"./^$windSensor$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(90s) fill(none)
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("strike_count"))) FROM "${lightningSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("CPM")*0.00668  FROM "cpm" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)

panels.description:
difference between readings for calculating "rising" and "falling" without looking at a graph.

Official UK met standards are what I used because they were the first I found.

targets.query: SELECT last("Barometer") FROM /^$baroSensor$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

panels.title: Baro

targets.query: SELECT mean("temperature_C")  *1.8+32 FROM "${tempSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("humidity") FROM "${tempSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("dewpoint")  *1.8+32 FROM "Dewpoint"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("heatindex") *1.8+32 FROM "Heatindex" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("wind_avg_km_h") * 0.6213712 FROM "${windSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("wind_max_km_h") * 0.6213712 FROM "${windSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Barometer") FROM /^$baroSensor$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("wind_dir_deg") FROM /^$windSensor$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("strike_count")) FROM "${lightningSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("storm_dist") * 0.6213712 FROM  "${lightningSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("rain_mm")))*0.03937 FROM "${rainSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("Wet Bulb Temp") *1.8+32 FROM "autogen"."Wet Bulb Temp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("CPM")*0.00668  FROM "cpm" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("temperature_C")  *1.8+32 FROM "Acurite-606TX" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("temperature_C") *1.8+32 FROM "Acurite-Tower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("temperature_C") *1.8+32 FROM "Acurite-6045M" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("temperature_C") *1.8+32 FROM "Acurite-5n1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("temperature_C") *1.8+32 FROM "LaCrosse-TX141THBv2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("Outdoor Temp") FROM "autogen"."Bryant" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

alert.message: AcuRiute Lightning sensor reports a problem.
alert.name: Acurite 6045M Exception Check alert

alert.message: Batteries in 5-in-1 station need to be changed.
alert.name: Acurite 5-in-1 Weatherstation alert

alert.message: Lightning in area!  Use caution outside.
alert.name: Lightning Alerts alert

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("strike_count")) FROM /^$lightningSensor$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("storm_dist")) FROM /^$lightningSensor$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

alert.message: LaCrosse Battery Low.  Change the one in the rain gauge too.
alert.name: LaCrosse Battery Check alert

targets.query: SELECT last("battery_ok") FROM "LaCrosse-TX141THBv2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Battery Check for Backyard Soil monitor
